admin-menu.blog: Manage and edit blog posts, categories, and comments from the admin dashboard.
admin-menu.book: Administer book entries, categories, and other related settings for a book management system.
admin-menu.comment: Create and manage comments, including content, users, and submission settings.
admin-menu.email: Configure and oversee email communications and templates for newsletters and notifications.
admin-menu.experiences: Manage and update various user experiences and feedback collected through the platform.
admin-menu.links: Edit and organize important links and their categories for easy navigation and access.
admin-menu.media: Upload, organize, and manage all media files used throughout the website or application.
admin-menu.newsletter: Create and manage newsletters, including content, recipients, and distribution settings.
admin-menu.projects: Oversee and manage projects, including details, updates, and statuses from the admin interface.
admin-menu.subscriber: View and manage subscriber lists, preferences, and interactions for newsletters and updates.
admin-menu.technology: Manage technology-related settings, integrations, and updates for the website or application.
admin-menu.users: View, edit, and manage user accounts, roles, and permissions within the admin panel.

media-menu.about: View, add, and delete images for the gallery about me through the dashboard.
media-menu.angular: View, add, and delete images for the gallery angular through the dashboard.
media-menu.blogs: View, add, and delete pictures for blogs through the dashboard.
media-menu.books: View, add, and delete pictures for books through the dashboard.
media-menu.javascript: View, add, and delete images for the gallery JavaScript through the dashboard.
media-menu.mongodb: View, add, and delete images for the gallery MongoDB through the dashboard.
media-menu.projects: View, add, and delete pictures for projects through the dashboard.
media-menu.python: View, add, and delete images for the gallery Python through the dashboard.
media-menu.typescript: View, add, and delete images for the gallery TypeScript through the dashboard.
media-menu.vue: View, add, and delete images for the gallery Vue through the dashboard.

tech-menu.angular: Angular is a TypeScript-based framework for building dynamic, single-page applications (SPAs). It offers robust tools for scalability, maintainability, and testing.
tech-menu.javascript: JavaScript is a versatile, high-level programming language used to create interactive, dynamic web applications. It’s essential for modern web development.
tech-menu.mongodb: MongoDB is a NoSQL database designed for high scalability and flexibility. It stores data in JSON-like documents, making it ideal for modern applications.
tech-menu.python: Python is a versatile, high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It’s widely used in web development, data analysis, and automation.
tech-menu.typescript: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. It enhances code quality, maintainability, and developer productivity.
tech-menu.vue: Vue is a progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It’s designed for flexibility, making it easy to integrate into projects.

home.subtitle: A platform for everyone passionate about programming and technologies. Discover in-depth insights into modern programming languages, technologies, and innovations shaping the future. Join a community dedicated to continuous learning and exploration of the digital world.

language-popularity.description: This chart shows the most popular programming languages based on the number of questions tagged with each language on StackOverflow. The data reflects the total number of tags associated with each language, providing insights into the languages most frequently discussed in the developer community.
language-popularity.title: Top Programming Languages

users.description: On this page, all registered users are listed. Each user has their own profile, where their information, introduction, and other interesting details are visible. My goal is to connect users and provide them with easy access to certain platform features. Join us!
